activities.name: Create External Challenger Table
activities.description:
USE LoL_Data;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE challenger_matches
    WITH (
        LOCATION = '/challenger_matches',
        DATA_SOURCE = lol_datasets,
        FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFormat
    )
AS
SELECT *,
    '14.4.1' AS patch
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'challenger_matches_patch_14.4.1.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'lol_datasets',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS item_details

scripts.text:
USE LoL_Data;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE challenger_matches
    WITH (
        LOCATION = '/challenger_matches',
        DATA_SOURCE = lol_datasets,
        FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFormat
    )
AS
SELECT *,
    '14.4.1' AS patch
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'challenger_matches_patch_14.4.1.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'lol_datasets',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS item_details

USE LoL_Data;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE item_details
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'lol_data/',
        DATA_SOURCE = lol_datasets,
        FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFormat
    )
AS
SELECT *,
    '14.4.1' AS patch
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'item_details_patch_14.4.1.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'lol_datasets',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS item_details
GROUP BY id, name;

SELECT [assists]
,[championName]
,[deaths]
,[gameEndedInEarlySurrender]
,[gameEndedInSurrender]
,[goldEarned]
,[goldSpent]
,i0.[name] AS item0
,i1.[name] AS item1
,i2.[name] AS item2
,i3.[name] AS item3
,i4.[name] AS item4
,i5.[name] AS item5
,i6.[name] AS item6
,[kills]
,[magicDamageDealtToChampions]
,[magicDamageTaken]
,[physicalDamageDealtToChampions]
,[physicalDamageTaken]
,[teamPosition]
,[timePlayed]
,[totalMinionsKilled]
,[visionScore]
,[win]
,c.[patch]
 FROM [dbo].[challenger_matches] c
JOIN item_details i0 ON c.item0 = i0.id 
JOIN item_details i1 ON c.item1 = i1.id 
JOIN item_details i2 ON c.item2 = i2.id 
JOIN item_details i3 ON c.item3 = i3.id 
JOIN item_details i4 ON c.item4 = i4.id 
JOIN item_details i5 ON c.item5 = i5.id 
JOIN item_details i6 ON c.item6 = i6.id
